job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI at Boskalis. In this challenging role you will be instrumental in building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services. You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists to integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment. Next to that you will also be responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date., * Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
     * Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
     * Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.
     * Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing.
     * Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings.
job_details.full_text:
NET Software Engineer (AI Focus)

Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI at Boskalis. In this challenging role you will be instrumental in building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services. You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists to integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment. Next to that you will also be responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date., * Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
     * Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
     * Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.
     * Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing.
     * Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services, integrating AI models and algorithms into .NET applications, and ensuring scalability and efficiency. While it mentions AI, the core focus on integrating models into existing .NET applications, ensuring scalability, and maintaining applications, along with the mention of 'AI models and algorithms' without specific generative AI techniques, leans more towards an ML Engineer role. The mention of 'AI researchers' suggests collaboration on model integration rather than core generative model development. The emphasis on .NET and Microsoft technologies also aligns with a traditional software engineering background applied to ML integration.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies' directly points to traditional software development practices applied to applications that incorporate AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications' indicates a task involving the implementation and integration of pre-existing or developed AI models.

The phrase 'ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment' describes core software engineering concerns for application development.
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date' is a direct software development and maintenance task.
job_tasks.phrase: maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date

job_tasks.justification: The bullet point 'Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices' is a standard software development responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices

job_tasks.justification: The bullet point 'Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing' are fundamental software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings' implies a need to understand and potentially prepare data or models for integration, which can touch upon data engineering aspects.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications' directly relates to the task of working with and integrating AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications

soft_skills.phrase: work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists
Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks
ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated
